title: Khloe Kardashian works her magic in plunging black blouse with ripped boyfriend jeans
text:
She's currently in Los Angeles while her sisters are out of the country.

But Khloe Kardashian still had company for lunch on Tuesday.

The reality star, 35, was spotted enjoying a midday meal with family friend Scott Disick at Stanley's Restaurant in Sherman Oaks.

Let's do lunch! Khloe Kardashian was spotted enjoying a midday meal with family friend Scott Disick in Sherman Oaks

Khloe was indeed dressed to turn heads as she arrived to the restaurant, separately from Scott.

Hair slicked up in a perfect bun, Khloe worked a plunging pinstripe blouse that flashed a hint of he nude bra.

She rocked ripped boyfriends jeans and a strappy pair of black heels.

The KUWTK star accessorized the trendy look with large, edgy shades, an ornate silver necklace, and huge hoop earrings.

Walk and talk: The pair were seen arm-in-arm after catching up over lunch

Making their entrance: Kardashian and Scott arrived separately for their midday meal

She's ripped! The reality star sported a ripped pair of boyfriend jeans

Scott was looking cool and casual as usual.

The father-of-three embraced his smart side for the day, opting to slick his hair back with a touch of gel.

He sported a lightweight grey sweater, beige trousers, white trainers, and cool shades.

Throwing shade: The pair were both rocking cool sunglasses

What's the latest? The pair still had a lot to chat about after lunch

Looking sharp! The father-of-three embraced his smart side for the day, opting to slick his hair back with a touch of gel

Across the globe, sisters Kim and Kourtney Kardashian have been touring Armenia with their family.

On Tuesday, the sisters laid flowers at the Armenian Genocide Memorial Complex in Tsitsernakaberd, Yerevan with Kourtney's children, Mason and Penelope.

Just a day earlier, Kim baptized her sons Saint, three, Psalm, four months, and daughter Chicago, in Yerevan, Armenia.

Hello gorgeous: Khloe looked simply stunning with her hair slicked up into a perfect bun
description: The reality star, 35, was spotted enjoying a midday meal with family friend Scott Disick in Sherman Oaks. Khloe was indeed dressed to turn heads as she arrived to the restaurant.
